ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of THOMAS RAFFY of Moncton, New Brunswick, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of New Brunswick, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on July 15, 2024.
